actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Expressing the heartfelt sympathy of the House of Representatives for the victims of the earthquake on February 24, 2004, near Al Hoceima, Morocco, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses: (1) condolences of the House of Representatives for the victims of the earthquake on February 24, 2004, near Al Hoceima, Morocco, and their loved ones; and (2) gratitude and appreciation for the courageous work of U.S. officials and international aid workers in Morocco in response to the earthquake.

titles.title: Expressing the heartfelt sympathy of the House of Representatives for the victims of the earthquake on February 24, 2004, near Al Hoceima, Morocco, and for other purposes.
